il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl

Class BusinessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.bl.BusinessLogic

  • public class BusinessLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the logic of this process:
    1. Read input via FileInputReader
    2. for each request in the input:
    2.1. Convert request to EventData
    2.2. Retrieve the appropriate AbstractStateHandler
    2.3. activate the handler and retrieve response as EventData
    2.4. Convert the response to a String and append the output buffer
    3. Write the output buffer to FileOutputWriter
    Author:
    liort

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AccountStorage db 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BusinessLogic() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      Prepare an input, iterate over the requests and write results.
      Request and response are a String terminated by a '\n' sign.
      This method calls handleRequest(String) to handle each request
      and uses java.lang.StringBuilder.StringBuilder to aggregate the responses.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
